messages.content: I live in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.
That's great! What's your favorite part about living there?
I love my morning coffee at Devoción on Grand Street.
Sounds like a nice spot! Do you go there every day?
Yes, I try to go every morning before work.
Do you have any favorite neighbors?
My neighbor Mike fixed my bike, and I owe him $50.
That's nice of him! How's the neighborhood overall?
I love it! There's also a hardware store 2 blocks away on Bedford Ave.
Perfect for quick errands!
On Sundays, I go to the farmers market at McCarren Park.
That must be fun! What do you usually buy there?
I like to get fresh produce and some baked goods.
Yum! Do you have a favorite vendor?
There's this great bread vendor I always visit.
Sounds delicious! Are you planning to stay in Williamsburg for a long time?
Actually, I'm moving to Copenhagen, Nørrebro soon for work.
Wow, that's a big change! When are you moving?

sessions.topic: Announcing the move to Copenhagen, Nørrebro

messages.content: I'm moving next month to Copenhagen, Nørrebro.
That sounds exciting! What are you looking forward to most?
I can't wait to try the coffee and cardamom bun at Mirabelle.
That sounds delicious! Have you been to Copenhagen before?
No, I haven't. It's a completely new adventure for me.
It definitely sounds like one! How are you feeling about the move?
I've settled into my new place in Nørrebro.
That's great to hear! How's the neighborhood?
I love cycling to the lakes for my morning exercise.
That sounds refreshing! Are there any good spots around the lakes?
Yes! There's a nice park nearby where I can relax.
Great! How's your neighbor situation?
My neighbor Søren shares his homemade aquavit with me.
That sounds like a fun neighbor to have!
I visited the flea market at Assistens Cemetery last weekend.
That must have been interesting! What did you find?
I found some vintage items and a cool piece of art.
Nice! Are you planning to go back again?
Definitely! I love exploring new shops.
Sounds like you're really enjoying Copenhagen!

queries.question: What should I do this Saturday morning?

reference_answer.text: Since you're in Copenhagen, Nørrebro now, you should check out the flea market at Assistens Cemetery.
